tags.name: file-system-broker
tags.description:
`file-system-broker`
`singleton to simplify interactions with the file system on a user's device`

tags.name: docx-file-system-broker
tags.description:
Web component that bridges local file system via File API and
combines the functionality of the DOCX parser so that you can easily
load a file / directory from the user's file system and then access
that data from DOCX

tags.name: xlsx-file-system-broker
tags.description:
Web component that bridges local file system via File API and
combines the functionality of the XSLX parser so that you can easily
load a file / directory from the user's file system and then access
that data from XLSX / ODS / CSV repos

tags.name: file-system-broker
tags.description:
`file-system-broker`
`singleton to simplify interactions with the file system on a user's device`
